meanings.definition: Having or consisting of multiple tiers or levels.
meanings.sent1: The multitiered cake had three layers of delicious frosting.
meanings.sent2: The office building had a multitiered design with different floors for each department.
meanings.sent3: The multitiered wedding cake looked like a tower of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: The multitiered seating arrangement at the theater made every seat a good one.
meanings.sent5: The multitiered garden showcased flowers at different heights, creating a beautiful display.

meanings.sent1: The multitiered shelves in the store displayed products at various heights.
meanings.sent2: The multitiered wedding dress had lace details on each layer.
meanings.sent3: The multitiered sandwich was so tall, it was hard to take a bite!
meanings.sent4: The multitiered fountain cascaded water down each level gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The multitiered pyramid was a symbol of the ancient civilization's architectural prowess.
